channel.title: Hobbit on Liu Qiran
channel.description: Recent content in Hobbit on Liu Qiran

item.title: Chapter V RIDDLES IN THE DARK
item.description:
Bilbo met a Gollum. Gollum lived on a slimy island in the dark lake. Gollum can eat goblins, but he also likes riddle.
What have I got in my pocket? This riddle is not fair for Gollum.
Bilbo got a ring! It’s Gollum’s birthday present! Bilbo Baggins, he is a thief!
Now the ring made Bilbo invisible. He escaped the cave from goblins!

item.title: CHAPTER IV Over Hill and Under Hill
item.description:
“Why, O why did I ever leave my hobbit-hole!” said poor Mr. Baggins.
They were chased by Goblins. Bilbo wished that he can stay in his comfort zone, but things worse happened.

item.title: CHAPTER III A Short Rest
item.description: It’s a long and hard journey. They all knew the adventure full of dangers. They were no food, no water, caught in the rain. In the last, they had a rest in Elrond’s house.

item.title: CHAPTER II Roast Mutton
item.description: Bilbo, as a burglar, wanted to see and steal some foods from trolls, but Bilbo Baggins and dwarves captured by trolls. In the end, they were saved by Gandalf.

item.title: CHAPTER I: AN UNEXPECTED PARTY
item.description:
Bilbo Baggins, the hobbit, met dwarves and the wizard Gandalf.

Bilbo lives in his comfortable cave, it’s a fantastic, cozy zone. But the wizard choose him. What’s more, his Tookish mind in his heart pushes him to the beginning of the adventure.
